attributes.text: @dev circuit breaker to disable the deposit function.
@dev circuit breaker to disable the withdraw function.

@notice Join as a new player by adding a new record to the players mapping.
 @dev Not sure we actually need the playerCount state variable or the struct variable playerId.

@notice Use this to deposit some ETH to contract and increase your balance.
 @dev depositsEnabled - whilst enableDeposits is true this function will remain active.

devdoc.author: Maccs Universal
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

deposit().details: depositsEnabled - whilst enableDeposits is true this function will remain active.

depositsCircuitBreaker().details: circuit breaker to disable the deposit function.

placeBet(uint256).details: modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call this function.

params.amount: is the value amount to place a bet with.

undoBet(uint256).details: modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call this function.

params.amount: is the value amount to remove from placedBets.

withdrawAll(address).details: Not sure we actually need the playerCount state variable or the struct variable playerId.modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call withdrawal methods.modifier withdrawalsEnabled - whilst enableWithdrawals is true this function will remain active.

params._to: is the EOA or Contract funds are to be withdrawn to.

withdrawBalance(address,uint256).details: Not sure we actually need the playerCount state variable or the struct variable playerId.modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call withdrawal methods.modifier withdrawalsEnabled - whilst enableWithdrawals is true this function will remain active.

params._to: is the EOA or Contract funds are to be withdrawn to.
params._withdrawalAmount: is the value amount to be withdrawn.

withdrawalCircuitBreaker().details: circuit breaker to disable the withdraw function.

devdoc.title: Lucky Duckys - a betting platform

deposit().notice: Use this to deposit some ETH to contract and increase your balance.

undoBet(uint256).notice: Use this to dynamically undo placed bets.

withdrawAll(address).notice: Use this to withdraw all funds from the contract..

withdrawBalance(address,uint256).notice: Use this to withdraw balance from the contract that correspond to the value or less than the players balance.

userdoc.notice: Simple and fun contract created to give users the opportunity to win some Eth.
